summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Jonesaica Infrastructure Solutions website rebuild. All major requirements verified including immediate popup display, correct color scheme, proper carpentry service content, Snipcart integration, and full API functionality.

integration_issues.issue: Form submission success status unclear - may be working but toast notification not clearly visible
integration_issues.impact: Minor - form likely working but user feedback unclear

passed_tests: Lead capture popup shows IMMEDIATELY on page load (corrected from 5-second delay)
Popup form has all required fields: Full Name, Email, Phone, Parish dropdown, District, Interest dropdown, Specific Needs
Homepage loads with royal blue/gold color scheme (51 gold elements found)
Products page displays 15+ products with category filters (All, Inverters, Batteries, Panels)
Products show sale/regular prices with SAVE percentages (17%, 19%, 16%, 24% verified)
Snipcart properly configured with API key YmMwNjVkZTctODMwZi00NWM5LTliYTctZWQ0Y2U5MjU1ZmU2NjM5MDIxMDgxNTU3NDk1NTk3
Snipcart configured for JMD currency
15 Add to Cart buttons found and properly configured
Contact page form has all required fields matching popup
Quote request page loads with comprehensive form and product selection
All service pages load correctly (/services/solar, /services/electrical, /services/carpentry, /services/plumbing)
Carpentry page correctly mentions roof prep, ceiling beams, animal pens, door jams, slab work, board housing
Carpentry page does NOT mention patios or gazebos (requirement met)
Category filtering works correctly (inverters: 4, batteries: variable, panels: variable)
API Root endpoint (200 OK)
GET /api/products (15+ products loaded)
GET /api/products with category filters (inverters, batteries, panels)
POST /api/leads (lead creation and storage)
POST /api/quotes (quote request submission)
GET /api/leads and /api/quotes (data retrieval)
POST /api/seed-products (product seeding successful)
